name: City Prisoner police vehicle Transporter 3d simulator
name_original: City Prisoner police vehicle Transporter 3d simulator
description:
City Prisoner Transporter

Become a policeman, hop into the police bus and transport criminals and prisoners from policestation to other for hearing,Transfer the prisoners to high security prison cell, Police Bus Prisoner Transport gives you an exciting 3D game play. You have to be a great driver,
do you think you can control a heavy police bus in difficult hills climb roads, do you think you can drive a bus with
criminals,robbers,thief,and take them safely at policestation.
Pick and drop police cops to maintain peaceful city environment.Give the criminals a thrilling ride. Leave no avenue of escape!
Drive the police bus, follow the police officer instructions and fulfill your duty as the prisoners transporter bus driver.

Key features:

police bus transport experience in a crime city environment
- Smooth controls
- Superb 3D graphics
- 20 Difficult Game play Missions
- Pick and Drop imprisonment from Different station
- Amazing bus simulation experience
